address: Punta Engano Road, Lapu Lapu 6015 Philippines
features: Reservations, Outdoor Seating, Private Dining, Seating, Parking Available, Highchairs Available, Wheelchair Accessible, Serves Alcohol, Full Bar, Free Wifi, Accepts Credit Cards, Table Service, Live Music
about: The Cowrie Cove Seafood Bar and Grill experience is a surfeit of sensation: brightly lit fish tanks at the entrance, a location overlooking a calm sea and exquisitely prepared dishes. Well-thought-out spaces include a lower deck open to the night sky and 2 private rooms for intimate celebrations. The bar is a vibrant outpost humming with energy, and enthusiastic bartenders put on entertaining displays. Signature cocktails pair well with a small, carefully chosen menu of appetizing bites.

name: Basilica del Santo Niño
address: Osmena Boulevard, Cebu City 6000 Philippines
about: This famous church dates back to the early Spanish colonial era. The Church was founded by the Augustinian friars since their arrival in 1565. You could also find in the church the miraculous image of Sto. Nino (Child-Jesus).

name: Casa Gorordo Museum
address: 35 Eduardo Aboitiz St, Cebu City 6000 Philippines
about: Casa Gorordo is a house museum located in the historic Parian district of Cebu, the oldest city in the Philippines. Built in the 1850's, it lived through several important social changes that shaped modern Filipino identity. A tour of the house provides visitors insightful glimpses into the history of Cebu and the rich cultural heritage of Cebuanos. The museum is one of the Philippines' National Historical Landmarks.

name: Cebu Ocean Park
address: South Road Properties SM Seaside Complex, Cebu City 6000 Philippines
about: We are the largest Oceanarium in the Philippines aiming to provide both our visitors and community a unique marine-life experience to achieve our dream to educate, conserve and inspire. What drives us? Young and old, we want to see the spark of child-like wonder in your eyes when you see something captivating for the first time. Young and old, we want to touch your lives, and that includes our animal friends! We want to be the center of your experience — to touch a starfish for the first time, to feel the excitement of a first date, to celebrate all your milestones, to forge bonds with your colleagues, or to simply just spend some quality time with your loved ones. Let’s all embrace the kid inside us as we discover how nature holds the greatest magic of all.
